summary: Provides generic helper utilities and a dynamic subtype manager used by the Step Functions parser. Includes functions for case conversion, collection type checking, attribute extraction, and string conversion, as well as a manager that discovers concrete subclasses of a base type and supplies singleton instances on demand.
business_intent: Support the parsing and processing of AWS Step Functions state machine definitions within the Moto mock library by offering reusable utilities and a flexible mechanism to locate and instantiate specific parser components lazily.
